ControlAltDelete your weekend plans PERIOD The brilliant science fiction comedyUpload which takes place in a dystopian version of our world where no one ever truly needs to die for the right price logs back on after a year and a half offline PERIOD

When we last saw him Nathan Robbie Amell  the murdered tech bro whose consciousness was uploaded into the costly virtual Lakeview afterlife resort in the series opener  had downloaded into a cloned body of himself PERIOD This allowed Nathan to finally get physical with his Lakeview case workerlove interest Nora Andy Allo PERIOD

Credit Prime Video

Unfortunately it also put him in massive danger since the stillfaulty downloading process tends to cause subjects heads to explode after a short while PERIOD With the clock ticking thats definitely a concern director and supervising producer David Rogers says adding that Season 2s finale did close on Nathan  shortly after sleeping with Nora  experiencing a nosebleed PERIOD That leaves the audience and Nathan wondering Oh what does this mean

We find out early on in Season  which digs deeper into how Lakeviews parent company Horizen is connected to a new free afterlife alternative and what they plan to do with so many uploaded consciousnesses PERIOD There is a conspiracy says Rogers of a timely twist related to voter fraud that will keep Nora and Nathan on their toes PERIOD

At the same time the newly promoted Aleesha Zainab Johnson who will have some drama with her former office bestie Nora begins to see just how messy Horizen is from the inside PERIOD She carries a lot of scenes Rogers teases PERIOD

And back in the digital realm Nathans effusive buddy Luke Kevin Bigley is crashing emotionally PERIOD He is having a hard time Rogers says with a laugh PERIOD Nathan is gone so hes trying to fill that gap with a new best friend. will Lakeviews helpful A.I PERIOD Guy Owen Daniels be there to pick up the pieces

Upload Season  Premiere Friday October  Prime Video

This is an excerpt from TV Insiders October issue PERIOD For more indepth reported coverage devoted to streaming shows from the publishers of TV Guide Magazine pick up the issue currently on newsstands or purchase it online here PERIOD You can also subscribe to TV Insider Magazine here now PERIOD
